name: The Last Day (itch) (CityStream)
description:
Introduction

The female protagonist says goodbye to two male friends who live together on different floors of the same apartment before moving to a new place.

Gameplay

A short everyday-oriented visual novel. Players will play the female protagonist who spends the last day at her old apartment with two male friends and face the complex relationship between the three of them. The game has 3 CGs and 9 endings.

Platform

Production engine: Unity

Platform: PC (Windows/Mac)

Available storage space required: 300MB

Language: English and Simplified Chinese

Credits

Production: CityStream Studios

Script: SUIK

Art: SUIK

Art Support: Pixabay, Pxhere

Music Support: Epidemic Sound, Pixabay

(For a detailed list, please see the in-game ED)

Note:  Because the game uses a license from Epidemic Sound that covers only the game engine but not its derived video, if uploaders have to upload a video of playing the game to YouTube or any other social media platform, they will be subject to receiving copyright claims unless they have a license from Epidemic Sound as well.
